name: TX_ANES_CONC_EXCL
description: The TX_ANES_CONC_EXCL table contains information concerning the concurrency exclusion date and times for an anesthesia charge.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique key or identification number for a given transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column contains the line count for the concurrency period exclusion information in this table.  Each piece of concurrency period exclusion information is stored on a separate line, one line for each exclusion.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The starting time of the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency calculation.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The starting date of the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency calculation.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: The ending time of the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency calculation.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The ending date of the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency calculation.

columns.name: EXCLUSION_COMMENT
columns.description: Comment for the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency calculation.
